sen.j: 塚本 善之助（つかもと ぜんのすけ、生没年不詳）は、新選組一番隊隊士。
sen.e: Zennosuke TSUKAMOTO (dates of birth and death unknown) was a member of theIchibantai (first squad) in the Shinsengumi.
Zennosuke TSUKAMOTO (dates of birth and death unknown) was a member of theIchibantai (first squad) in the Shinsengumi.
sen.cmt: was の前のスペースを削除しました。the の後にスペースを付け足しました。
sen.e: Zennosuke TSUKAMOTO (dates of birth and death unknown) was a member of theIchibantai (first squad) in the Shinsengumi.

sen.j: 元治元年十二月までの京坂における、隊士募集に応じて入隊する。
sen.e: He joined the Shinsengumi by applying for membership recruitment which had been conducted in Osaka and Kyoto areas until January 1865.
He joined the Shinsengumi by applying for membership recruitment which had been conducted in Osaka and Kyoto areas until January 1865.
He joined the Shinsengumi by applying for membership recruitment which had been conducted in Osaka and Kyoto areas until January 1865.

sen.j: 同月の組織編成では、沖田総司の一番隊に所属している。
sen.e: In the reorganization of January 1865, he became a member of the Ichibantai (first squad) headed by Soji OKITA.
In the reorganization of January 1865, he became a member of the Ichibantai (first squad) headed by Soji OKITA.
In the reorganization of January 1865, he became a member of the Ichibantai (first squad) headed by Soji OKITA.

sen.j: しかし、慶応元年七月以前に離隊。
sen.e: He, however, left the Shinsengumi before August 1865.
He, however, left the Shinsengumi before August 1865.
He, however, left the Shinsengumi before August 1865.

sen.j: その後一生を百姓として広島で過ごしたとされる。
sen.e: He is said to have spent the rest of his life as a farmer in Hiroshima Prefecture.
He is said to have spent the rest of his life as a farmer in Hiroshima Prefecture.
He is said to have spent the rest of his life as a farmer in Hiroshima Prefecture.
